titles.title: To suspend temporarily the duty on 5-(N,N-dibenzylglycyl)-salicylamide; 2-[N-benzyl-N-tert-butylamino]-4'-hydroxy-3'-hydroxymethylac tophenone hydrochloride; Fultamide; and Loratadine.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E902)

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Executive Comment Requested from Treasury, Commerce, ITC, USTR.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means
House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 4/1/1993--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 1996, the duty on: (1) 5 -(N,N-dibenzylglycyl)-salicylamide (LBH-B/C); (2) 2-(N-benzyl-N-tert-butylamino)-4-hydroxy-3- hydromethylacetophenone hydrochloride (Glycyl hydrochloride); (3) flutamide; and (4) loratadine.
